metadata.synopsis: A player remarks on a combat encounter with a Sahuagin that appeared on a beach in the Lower City. When the player approaches the shore, they come out of the sea and start attacking.Their presence alludes to the Iron Throne situation, as made clear through loot on their corpses. Sahuagin are scary-looking antropomorphic amphibians, sometimes called "sea devils" or "fish heads" (derogatory).Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-gin.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use ReCon command "goto 52 3 -138"- "killcombat" to kill all the Sahuagin after they appear and attack.- This PAD will play after a short delay, on a player who was in that combat.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Sahuagin. But why are they so close to the city?
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-ginNodeContext: Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-gin

1.speaker: Player
1.text: More of those creatures. Not sure why they're attacking out in the open like this.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-ginNodeContext: Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-gin

2.speaker: Player
2.text: What are these things? And gods, do they stink.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-ginNodeContext: Sahuagin is pronounced sah-HWAH-gin
